name: Cloak of Shadows
Description: Provides the Hero with invisibility when worn. An invisible Hero is untargetable by the enemy unless detected. If the Hero moves, attacks, uses an ability, or casts a spell, the invisibility effect is lost.

name: Gauntlets of Ogre Strength +3
Description: Increases the Strength of the Hero by 3 when worn.

name: Mantle of Intelligence +3
Description: Increases the Intelligence of the Hero by 3 when worn.

name: Ring of Superiority
Description: Increases the Strength, Agility and Intelligence of the Hero by 1 when worn.

name: Slippers of Agility +3
Description: Increases the Agility of the Hero by 3 when worn.

name: Claws of Attack +5
Description: Increases the attack damage of the Hero by 5 when worn.

name: Gloves of Haste
Description: Increases the attack speed of the Hero by 15% when worn.

name: Ring of Protection +4
Description: Increases the armor of the Hero by 4 when worn.

name: Circlet of Nobility
Description: Increases the Strength, Agility and Intelligence of the Hero by 2 when worn.

name: Claws of Attack +8
Description: Increases the attack damage of the Hero by 8 when worn.

name: Pendant of Energy
Description: Increases the mana capacity of the Hero by 100 when worn.

name: Periapt of Vitality
Description: Increases the hit points of the Hero by 150 when worn.

name: Ring of Protection +5
Description: Increases the armor of the Hero by 5 when worn.

name: Ring of Regeneration
Description: Increases the Hero's hit point regeneration by 2 hit points per second.

name: Talisman of Evasion
Description: Causes attacks against the wearer to miss 15% of the time.Does not stack with Evasion or Drunken Brawler.

name: Alleria's Flute of Accuracy
Description: Increases nearby ranged units' damage by 7.5%.Does not stack with Trueshot Aura.

name: Belt of Giant Strength +6
Description: Increases the Strength of the Hero by 6 when worn.

name: Boots of Quel'Thalas +6
Description: Increases the Agility of the Hero by 6 when worn.

name: Ring of the Archmagi
Description: Increases the Strength, Agility and Intelligence of the Hero by 3 when worn.

name: Robe of the Magi +6
Description: Increases the Intelligence of the Hero by 6 when worn.

name: Runed Bracers
Description:
Reduces Magic damage dealt to the Hero by 33%.The in game description is wrong, as it does only reduce damage of Spell Damage such as Storm Bolt.
It does not reduce damage of Magic Damage such as attacks from Frost Wyrms.
Heroes take only 70% damage from Spell Damage because of their armor type.
Combined with Runed Bracers, this results in a total damage reduction of 53.1%.
Runed Bracers do not stack, so having more of them will not decrease spell damage further.

name: Scourge Bone Chimes
Description: Grants a melee Hero and friendly nearby melee units life stealing attacks which take 15% of the damage they deal and convert it into life.Does not stack with Vampiric Aura.

name: Sobi Mask
Description:
Increases the Hero's rate of mana regeneration by 50% when worn.Sobi Mask increases the mana regeneration by:
Sobi Masks and Mana Stones stack with eachother and with themselves.

name: The Lion Horn of Stormwind
Description: Grants the Hero and friendly nearby units 1.5 bonus armor.Does not stack with Devotion Aura.

name: Ancient Janggo of Endurance
Description: Grants the Hero and friendly nearby units increased attack rate and movement speed.Does not stack with Endurance Aura.

name: Claws of Attack +12
Description: Increases the attack damage of the Hero by 12 when worn.

name: Cloak of Flames
Description:
Engulfs the Hero in fire which deals 10 damage per second to nearby enemy land units.Does not stack with Immolation.
Unlike all other versions of Immolation the Cloak of Flames also damages mechanical units.

name: Helm of Valor
Description: Increases the Strength and Agility of the Hero by 5 when worn.

name: Hood of Cunning
Description: Increases the Agility and Intelligence of the Hero by 5 when worn.

name: Khadgar's Pipe of Insight
Description: Grants the Hero and friendly nearby units a 0.5 bonus to mana regeneration.Does not stack with Brilliance Aura.

name: Legion Doom-Horn
Description: Grants the Hero and friendly nearby units increased life regeneration and movement speed.Does not stack with Unholy Aura.

name: Medallion of Courage
Description: Increases the Strength and Intelligence of the Hero by 5 when worn.

name: Warsong Battle Drums
Description: Increases the attack damage of nearby friendly units by 7.5% when worn.Does not stack with the Kodo Beast's War Drums Aura.

name: Amulet of Spell Shield
Description: Blocks a negative spell that an enemy casts on the Hero once every 40 seconds.The Amulet of Spell Shield only blocks unit target abilities.

name: Khadgar's Gem of Health
Description:
Increases the hit points of the Hero by 300 when worn.The Pendant of Energy and the Periapt of Vitality both are level 3 permanent items and
grant a bonus of 150 mana or hit points.
However the Khadgar's Gem of Health grants 300 hit points, whereas the Pendant of Mana only grants 250 mana despite being on the same level.

name: Orb of Darkness
Description:
This item adds an orb effect, for more information see: Orb Effects.Adds 6 bonus damage to the attack of a Hero when carried. The Hero's attack also becomes ranged when attacking air and will create a Lesser Dark Minion when it is the killing blow on an enemy unit. The Dark Minion lasts 80 seconds.
The attack does not need to be the killing blow, as the Orb of Darkness effect lasts for 3 seconds. If the target dies within this time, the Dark Minion will be summoned.
Only spawns a Lesser Dark Minion from units that would normally leave a corpse.

name: Pendant of Mana
Description:
Increases the mana capacity of the Hero by 250 when worn.The Pendant of Energy and the Periapt of Vitality both are level 3 permanent items and
grant a bonus of 150 mana or hit points.
However the Khadgar's Gem of Health grants 300 hit points, whereas the Pendant of Mana only grants 250 mana despite being on the same level.

name: Staff of Silence
Description: Stops all enemies in a target area from casting spells.The Staff of Silence is the only permanent item, that can be activated, since Patch 1.36.1 when the Crystal Ball became charged.

name: Crystal Ball
Description:
Reveals a targeted area. Invisible units are also revealed by the Crystal Ball's effect.Lasts 10 seconds.
The Crystal Ball is a charged item that works similarly to Far Sight or Reveal from the Goblin Laboratory. One charge costs 50 gold.

name: Replenishment Potion
Description: Non-Combat ConsumableRegenerates 200 hit points and 75 mana  of the Hero over 30 seconds.

name: Sentry Wards
Description: Drops a Sentry Ward to spy upon an area for 180 seconds.Contains 2 charges.

name: Wand of Illusion
Description: Create an illusory double of the targeted unit when used. The illusory double deals no damage to enemy units, takes 2 times the damage from enemy attacks, and will disappear after 60 seconds or when its  hit points  reach zero. Contains 2 charges.

name: Potion of Greater Healing
Description: Heals 500  hit points  when used.

name: Potion of Greater Mana
Description: Restores 200 mana when used.

name: Potion of Invulnerability
Description:
Potion of Invulnerability, also known as Greater Invulnerability Potion or Greater Invul Potion, is an item that makes the Hero invulnerable to damage for 15 seconds when used. An invulnerable Hero may not be the target of spells or effects.There are certain spells, that can target invulnerable units, for more information see: Invulnerability.
The Potion of Lesser Invulnerability shares its cooldown group with the Potion of Lesser Invulnerability, but not with the Potion of Divinity.

name: Scroll of the Beast
Description: Gives friendly nearby units a 25% bonus to damage for 45 seconds.

name: Wand of Mana Stealing
Description: Steals 60 mana from a target unit and gives it to the Hero.Contains 2 charges.

name: Ankh of Reincarnation
Description: Automatically brings the Hero back to life with 500  hit points  when the Hero wearing the Ankh dies.Notes

name: Book of the Dead
Description: Summons 3 Skeleton Warriors and 3 Skeleton Archers to fight for you.Lasts 120 seconds.

name: Healing Wards
Description: Drops a ward that heals nearby friendly units for 30 seconds.Contains 3 charges.

name: Health Stone
Description: Increases the life regeneration rate of the Hero by 1  hit points  per second when worn. Can be consumed for 500 health.

name: Mana Stone
Description:
Increases the mana regeneration rate of the Hero by 25% when worn. Can be consumed for 200 mana.Mana Stone increases the mana regeneration by:
Mana Stones and Sobi Masks stack with eachother and with themselves.

name: Wand of the Wind
Description:
Allows the Hero to cast Cyclone. Cyclone tosses a target enemy unit into the air, rendering it unable to attack, move or cast spells.Contains 2 charges. Lasts 20 seconds.
Notes

name: Blue Drake Egg
Description: Summons a Blue Drake to fight for you.Lasts 180 seconds.

name: Idol of the Wild
Description: Summons a Furbolg Tracker to fight for you.Lasts 180 seconds.

name: Potion of Divinity
Description: Turns the Hero invulnerable for 25 seconds.

name: Potion of Restoration
Description: Restores 500  hit points  and 200 mana  of the Hero when used.

name: Scroll of Restoration
Description: Restores 150 hit points and 150 mana of friendly non-mechanical units in an area around your Hero.

name: Spiked Collar
Description: Summons a Fel Stalker to fight for you.Lasts 180 seconds.

name: Stone Token
Description: Summons a Rock Golem to fight for you.Lasts 180 seconds.

name: Amulet of the Wild
Description: Summons a Furbolg Warrior. The Furbolg lasts 180 seconds.

name: Demonic Figurine
Description: Summons a Doom Guard (Summoned) to fight for you.Lasts 180 seconds.

name: Engraved Scale
Description: Summons a Blue Dragonspawn Overseer to fight for you.Lasts 180 seconds.

name: Ice Shard
Description: Summons an Ice Revenant. The Ice Revenant lasts 180 seconds.

name: Scepter of Avarice
Description: Kills a target unit instantly, transforming it into gold. 75% of the unit's cost is added to your available gold. Cannot be used on Heroes, or creeps above level 5.

name: Scepter of Mastery
Description: Transfers control of the targeted non-Hero unit to the player who uses the Scepter. The transfer of control is permanent. Cannot be used on Heroes or on creeps higher than level 5. Contains 3 charges.

name: Rune of Greater Healing
Description: Heals 400 hit points  to all nearby friendly non-mechanical units.

name: Rune of Healing
Description: Heals 250 hit points  to all nearby friendly non-mechanical units.

name: Rune of Lesser Healing
Description: Heals 125 hit points  to all nearby friendly non-mechanical units.

name: Rune of Mana
Description: Restores 125 mana to all nearby friendly units.

name: Rune of Rebirth
Description: Places the monster that held this rune under your control.

name: Rune of the Watcher
Description: Creates an invulnerable Sentry Ward when activated.

name: Manual of Health
Description: Permanently increases the hit points of the Hero by 50 when picked up.

name: Tome of Agility
Description: Permanently increases the Agility of the Hero by 1 when picked up.

name: Tome of Intelligence
Description: Permanently increases the Intelligence of the Hero by 1 when picked up.

name: Tome of Strength
Description: Permanently increases the Strength of the Hero by 1 when picked up.

name: Tome of Agility +2
Description: Permanently increases the Agility of the Hero by 2 when picked up.

name: Tome of Intelligence +2
Description: Permanently increases the Intelligence of the Hero by 2 when picked up.

name: Tome of Knowledge
Description: Permanently increases the Strength, Agility and Intelligence of the Hero by 1 when used.

name: Tome of Strength +2
Description: Permanently increases the Strength of the Hero by 2 when picked up.

name: Claws of Attack +15
Description: Increases the attack damage of the Hero by 15 when worn.

name: Inferno Stone
Description: Calls an Infernal down from the sky, dealing 50 damage and stunning enemy land units for 2 seconds in an area. The Infernal lasts 180 seconds.

name: Kelen's Dagger of Escape
Description: Allows the Hero to teleport a short distance.

name: Orb of Frost
Description:
This item adds an orb effect, for more information see: Orb Effects.Adds 6 bonus cold damage to the attack of a Hero when carried. The Hero's attacks also become ranged when attacking air and slow the movement speed and attack rate of the enemy for 3 seconds.
The Orb of Frost adds the generic Slowed buff to attacked units.
The slow effect only lasts 3 seconds (1 second on Heroes).
Every race has abilities that are better at slowing units than the Orb of Frost, making it a usually underwhelming item:

name: Crown of Kings +5
Description: Increases the Strength, Intelligence, and Agility of the Hero by 5 when worn.

name: Mask of Death
Description: This item adds an orb effect, for more information see: Orb Effects.While wearing this mask, a Hero will recover  hit points  equal to 50% of the attack damage dealt to an enemy unit.

name: Tome of Power
Description: Increases the level of the Hero by 1 when used.

name: Merchant
Description:
Goblin Merchant, or Shop, is a neutral building that sells items, and is included on almost all maps. Interactions with the shop are important throughout the game, as it is in many cases the only way to acquire key items such as Boots of Speed, Staff of Teleportation, Scroll of Healing or Potion of Lesser Invulnerability.
Shop Control means ensuring to get important items from the Goblin Merchant.
Items of particular contention are Boots of Speed, Potion of Invulnerability and Scroll of Healing.
There are multiple possibilities to get shop control. By having Map Control a player can stay close to the Goblin Merchant and prevent the opponent from getting
to the shop.
The right timings are very important for getting the items before the opponent. High mobility heroes like the Blademaster and items such as Boots of Speed or the Staff of Teleportation can help
to get to the shop.
Shop Control is especially important on Echo Isles, because there is only one shop on the map. If a player manages to get Boots of Speed for a powerful melee Hero such as the Blademaster or the Demon Hunter,
the player will be able to chase down the enemy hero and get map control in the early game.
A player can buy items from the shop in order to increase the strength of his army without having to spend lumber or go into upkeep.

name: Anti-magic Potion
Description: Gives the Hero immunity to magical spells for 15 seconds.

name: Boots of Speed
Description: Increases the movement speed of the Hero by 60 when worn.

name: Dust of Appearance
Description: Reveals enemy invisible units in an area around the Hero.
Sold From: Goblin MerchantTomb of RelicsAncient of Wonders

name: Healing Salve
Description: Non-Combat ConsumableRegenerates a target unit's hit points by 400 over 45 seconds when used.Contains 3 charges.

name: Ivory Tower
Description: Creates a Scout Tower at a target location.

name: Lesser Clarity Potion
Description: Regenerates the Hero's  mana  by 100 over 30 seconds when used.

name: Mechanical Critter
Description: Creates a player-controlled critter that can be used for scouting. Appears as a normal critter when viewed by the the enemy and does not draw aggro from units (although unlike proper critters, will be attacked if right-clicked).

name: Moonstone
Description: Causes an eclipse that blocks out the sun and creates an artificial night.Lasts 30 seconds.

name: Orb of Corruption
Description:
This item adds an orb effect, for more information see: Orb Effects.Adds 5 bonus damage to the attack of a Hero when carried. The Hero's attacks also become ranged when attacking air and reduce the armor of enemy units by 4 for 5 seconds.
The armor reduction happens, before the damage of the hero is dealt.
Missing an Attack does not trigger the reduction.
Reducing the armor of an enemy unit makes it take more damage from all attacks.
One Orb of Corruption has the highest value of all orbs in big fights, because it can increase the damage output of the entire army.
However having a second or a third Orb of Corruption does not add much benefit.

name: Orb of Fire
Description:
This item adds an orb effect, for more information see: Orb Effects.Adds 5 bonus fire damage to the attack of a Hero when carried. The Hero's attacks also become ranged when attacking air, and reduce the effectiveness of healing and regeneration on enemy units by 35% for 3 seconds.
In the past, this item was considered to be the worst orb in the game. Since the addition of the healing-reducing effect in patch 1.31.0, this orb has finally found its way into the meta, mainly in the matchup against the Undead.

name: Orb of Lightning
Description:
This item adds an orb effect, for more information see: Orb Effects.Adds 5 bonus damage to the attack of a Hero when carried. The Hero's attacks also become ranged when attacking air, and have a 30% chance to dispel magic and slow the movement speed of the enemy for 15 seconds.
Deals 150 bonus damage to summoned units.
The in game description says, it only slows for 3 seconds, however the actual slow duration is 15 seconds for units and 5 seconds for heroes.
It also prevents movement for 3 seconds for units and 1 second for heroes.
The Orb of Lightning is great to catch units and prevent them from running away.
When you use purge, that unit's movement speed will be reduced to 150. That unit's movement speed will start returning to its default value in the last 1/5 of that spells duration - in other words, if Purge duration is 15 seconds, move speed will return to normal over 3 seconds. If duration is 5 seconds, it will return over 1 second.

name: Orb of Venom
Description:
This item adds an orb effect, for more information see: Orb Effects.Adds 5 bonus damage to the attack of a Hero when carried. The Hero's attacks also become ranged when attacking air and poison enemy units for 6 seconds.
The poison damage is 9 damage per second.
If the Hero switches targets, the Orb of Venom will increase the damage output of the Hero by 59.
The Orb of Venom has the highest damage output of all orbs and can increase the dps of a small army by a lot. 
Because of this the Orb of Venom is especially useful in small fights, as an absolute damage bonus does not matter that much in huge armies in
comparison to the damage output of the army.
The poison damage stacks, if the orbs are carried by different Heroes.

name: Potion of Healing
Description: Heals 250 hit points when used.
Sold From: Arcane VaultVoodoo LoungeAncient of WondersTomb of Relics

name: Potion of Invisibility
Description:
Renders the Hero invisible for 120 seconds when used. An invisible Hero is untargetable by the enemy unless detected. If the Hero attacks, uses an ability, or casts a spell, the invisibility effect is lost.The Potion of Invisibility can be bought together with the Dust of Appearance to prevent the opponent from revealing the hero.
The Potion of Invisbility is often referred to as Invisbility Potion and Invis Potion.

name: Potion of Lesser Invulnerability
Description:
Makes the Hero invulnerable to damage for 7 seconds when used. An invulnerable Hero may not be the target of spells or effects.There are certain spells, that can target invulnerable units, for more information see: Invulnerability.
The Potion of Lesser Invulnerability shares its cooldown group with the Potion of Invulnerability, but not with the Potion of Divinity.

The Potion of Lesser Invulnerability is often referred to as Invulnerability Potion and Invul Potion.

name: Potion of Mana
Description: Restores 125 mana when used.
Sold From: Arcane VaultVoodoo LoungeAncient of WondersTomb of Relics

name: Ritual Dagger
Description:
Sacrifices a friendly Undead unit to regenerate 175 hit points over 45 seconds to all nearby non-mechanical units.Contains 2 charges.
Non-combat consumable (dispelled when the target takes damage).

name: Rod of Necromancy
Description: Creates two Skeleton Warriors from a corpse.Contains 4 charges.

name: Sacrificial Skull
Description: Creates an area of Blight at a target location.

name: Scroll of Healing
Description:
Heals 150 hit points to all friendly non-mechanical units around the Hero when used.The Heal Scroll has an area of effect of 600.
It is very important to counter area of effect abilities like Breath of Fire.
It is also useful against a lot of melee units, as they often do not focus fire a single unit, resulting in spreaded damage.
The area heal synergizes very well with Spirit Link.
As a properly used heal scroll can be one of the highest value consumables in the game,
maintaining "shop control" is essential; often games are decided by which player
manages to acquire the most heal scrolls.

name: Scroll of Protection
Description:
Increases the armor of all friendly units in an area around your Hero by 2 for 30 seconds.The Protection Scroll has an area of effect of 600.
It is rarely used, but can help get an advantage in fights.
It should not be used against a lot of Destroyers, as they can devour the buff.

name: Scroll of Regeneration
Description: Regenerates the  hit points  of all friendly non-mechanical units in an area around your Hero by 225 over 45 seconds when used.

name: Scroll of Speed
Description:
Increases the movement speed of the Hero and nearby allied units to the maximum movement speed.Does not apply on Goblin Sapper.
Lasts 10 seconds.

name: Scroll of Town Portal
Description: Teleports the Hero and any of its nearby troops to a target friendly town hall.
Sold From: Arcane VaultVoodoo LoungeAncient of WondersTomb of RelicsGoblin Merchant

name: Staff of Preservation
Description: Teleports a target friendly unit to its highest level town hall.

name: Staff of Sanctuary
Description: Teleports a target unit to your highest level town hall, stunning the unit and regenerating 15 hit points per second. Lasts until the unit is fully healed. Multiple instances of the heal-over-time effect stack.

name: Staff of Teleportation
Description: Teleports the Hero to the targeted allied land unit or structure.

name: Tiny Great Hall
Description: Creates a Great Hall at a target location. Human, Night Elf, and Undead players will get their racial equivalent town hall.

name: Tome of Retraining
Description:
Unlearns all of the Hero's spells, allowing the Hero to learn different skills.Only skills that are currently off cooldown are unlearned.
The Tome of Retraining is no Tome like the Tome of Experience.
The Tome of Retraining is rarely used, as most heroes have a preferred skill build, that is better than any other skill build in most scenarios.
The reason for this is, that many heroes have a skill that is much worse or less useful than their other skills.
Most heroes are forced to take a passive or cheap skill, because they don't have the mana to support two normal abilities.
Heroes that use it quite often are:
Heroes that could also benefit from retraining:

name: Anti-magic Potion
Description: Gives the Hero immunity to magical spells for 15 seconds.

name: Healing Salve
Description: Non-Combat ConsumableRegenerates a target unit's hit points by 400 over 45 seconds when used.Contains 3 charges.

name: Ivory Tower
Description: Creates a Scout Tower at a target location.

name: Lesser Clarity Potion
Description: Regenerates the Hero's  mana  by 100 over 30 seconds when used.

name: Claws of Attack +4

name: Claws of Attack +6
Description: Increases the attack damage of the Hero by 6 when worn.

name: Claws of Attack +9
Description: Increases the attack damage of the Hero by 9 when worn.

name: Goblin Land Mines
Description: Places a hidden land mine at a target point. Enemy units that move near the land mine will activate the mine, destroying the mine and causing area of effect damage to nearby units. Contains 3 charges.

name: Necklace of Spell Immunity
Description: Renders the Hero invulnerable to magic.

name: Red Drake Egg
Description: Summons a Red Drake to fight for you.Lasts 180 seconds.

name: Ring of Protection +2
Description: Increases the armor of the Hero by 2 when worn.

name: Ring of Protection +3
Description: Increases the armor of the Hero by 3 when worn.

name: Scroll of Animate Dead
Description: Raises 6 nearby dead units to fight for 40 seconds.

name: Scroll of Resurrection
Description: Brings 6 of your nearby dead units back to life.

name: Talisman of the Wild
Description:
This mystic stone summons a Furbolg to fight for you.Contains 3 charges.
Lasts 180 seconds.

name: Tome of Experience
Description: Grants 100 experience points to the hero when picked up.

name: Tome of Greater Experience
Description: Gives the Hero 500 bonus experience points when used.

name: Wand of Lightning Shield
Description:
Allows the Hero to cast Lightning Shield on a target unit. Lightning Shield surrounds a unit with electricity, dealing 20 damage per second to nearby units.Contains 2 charges.
Lasts 10 seconds.

name: Wand of Negation
Description: Dispels all magical effects in a target area. Deals 200 damage to summoned units. Contains 3 charges.
